title: Poster, "Mario Puzo's The Godfather", 1972
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Mario Puzo's The Godfather", 1972.
1972. Offset lithograph on wove paper. Gift of Sara and Marc Benda. 2010-21-132.
